code: /**  * @return An {@link IterativeCondition} that always returns {@code true}.  */ public static <T> IterativeCondition<T> trueFunction() {     return new SimpleCondition<T>() {          private static final long serialVersionUID = 8379409657655181451L.          @Override         public boolean filter(T value) throws Exception {             return true.         }     }. }
